Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: â€¢ A wave of social media unrest by the people over Australia's Stage 3 tax cuts following research by the Australia Institute that shows the cuts to be fiscally unproductive and ridiculously pricey; having an unfathomable cost of over $240 billion to the Budget in the next decade. People are on a mission to eradicate the tax cuts and the hashtag #auspol is hyping the revolution.
